text: Chadlia Saïda Farhat Essebsi (August 1, 1936 – September 15, 2019) was the former First Lady of Tunisia from 2014 through 2019. She was the wife of President Beji Caid Essebsi. She was Tunisia's fifth first lady, as well as the second following the Tunisian Revolution. She died in Tunis of a heart attack on 15 September 2019, aged 83, less than two months after her husband. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:People from Tunis Category:First Ladies
title: Chadlia Caid Essebsi
